00026 #define SQR(x)  (x)*(x)

00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00030 {
00031 
00032   // enough arguments ?
00033 
00034   if (argc < 2) {
00035     fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s [OPTIONS] state\n"
00036             "\n   -g            debug"
00037             "\n   -q            quiet"
00038             "\n   -C LOGO       show logo"
00039             "\n   -P            portrait orientation"
00040             "\n   -o            reorient"
00041             "\n   -f            no frame and axes"
00042             "\n   -x            no x-axis"
00043             "\n   -n            no labels, no annotations"
00044             "\n   -l LABEL      use label"
00045             "\n   -v {xy|yz|xz} select view"
00046             "\n   -c RANGE      coordinate range\n",
00047             argv[0]);
00048     exit(-1);
00049   }
00050 
00051   int debug=0, quiet=0;
00052   int portrait = 0;
00053   int orient=0;
00054   int view[3] = {1, 1, 1};
00055   int nplots[2] = {2, 3};
00056   int frame=1;
00057   int noxaxis=0;
00058   int plain=0;
00059 
00060   double xmax=5.5;
00061 
00062   int npoints=39+1;
00063 
00064   char* logo = NULL;
00065   char* label = NULL;
00066 
00067   char c;
00068   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "c:nNl:ogC:Pqv:fx")) != -1)
00069     switch (c) {
00070     case 'g':
00071       debug=1;
00072       break;
00073     case 'q':
00074       quiet=1;
00075       break;
00076     case 'P':
00077       portrait=1;
00078       break;
00079     case 'C':
00080       logo = optarg;
00081       break;
00082     case 'o':
00083       orient=1;
00084       break;
00085     case 'f':
00086       frame=0;
00087       break;
00088     case 'x':
00089       noxaxis=1;
00090       break;
00091     case 'n':
00092       plain=1;
00093       break;
00094     case 'l':
00095       label=optarg;
00096       break;
00097     case 'c':
00098       xmax = atof(optarg);
00099       break;
00100     case 'v':
00101       view[0]=0; view[1]=0; view[2]=0;
00102       nplots[1] = 1;
00103       if (!strcmp(optarg, "xy")) view[2]=1;
00104       if (!strcmp(optarg, "xz")) view[1]=1;
00105       if (!strcmp(optarg, "yz")) view[0]=1;
00106       break;
00107     }   
00108 
00109   char* slaterdetfile = argv[optind];
00110 
00111   SlaterDet Q;
00112   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, slaterdetfile))
00113     exit(-1);
00114 
00115   if (orient) {
00116     SlaterDetAux X;
00117     initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00118     calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00119     orientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00120   }
00121 
00122   if (!label)
00123     label = nucleusIDLformat(nucleusname(Q.A, Q.Z));
00124   
00125   double* dens = (double*) malloc(3*SQR(npoints)*sizeof(double));
00126 
00127   // write densities to data files
00128 
00129   char datafile[255];
00130   FILE *datafp;
00131   int v;
00132 
00133   snprintf(datafile, 255, "%s.denspn", slaterdetfile);;
00134   if (!(datafp = fopen(datafile, "w"))) {
00135     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", datafile);
00136     exit(-1);
00137   }
00138 
00139   // coordinate space densities
00140   for (v=0; v<3; v++)
00141     if (view[v]) {
00142 
00143       calcDensitiesCoordinate(&Q, v, npoints, xmax, dens);
00144 
00145       int i,j;
00146 
00147       // protons
00148       for (j=0; j<npoints; j++) {
00149         for (i=0; i<npoints; i++)
00150           fprintf(datafp, "%f  ", 
00151                   dens[i+j*npoints+npoints*npoints]/(0.5*rho0));
00152         fprintf(datafp, "\n");
00153       }
00154 
00155       // neutrons
00156       for (j=0; j<npoints; j++) {
00157         for (i=0; i<npoints; i++)
00158           fprintf(datafp, "%f  ", 
00159                   dens[i+j*npoints+2*npoints*npoints]/(0.5*rho0));
00160         fprintf(datafp, "\n");
00161       }
00162     }
00163 
00164   fclose(datafp);
00165 
00166   // writing IDL script
00167 
00168   char scriptfile[255];
00169   FILE* scriptfp;
00170 
00171   char* fmdhome;
00172 
00173   if (!(fmdhome = getenv("FMD"))) {
00174     fprintf(stderr, "environment variable FMD not defined\n");
00175     exit(-1);
00176   }
00177 
00178   snprintf(scriptfile, 255, "%s.denspn.script", slaterdetfile);
00179   if (!(scriptfp = fopen(scriptfile, "w"))) {
00180     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", scriptfile);
00181     exit(-1);
00182   }
00183 
00184   fprintf(scriptfp, 
00185           "; plot densities of nuclei\n; written by calcdensities\n\n");
00186   fprintf(scriptfp, "denspn=fltarr(%d,%d,%d)\n", 
00187           npoints, npoints, nplots[0]*nplots[1]);
00188 
00189   fprintf(scriptfp, "!path = '%s/lib:' + !path\n", fmdhome);
00190   fprintf(scriptfp, "openr, unit, '%s', /get_lun\n", datafile);
00191   fprintf(scriptfp, "readf, unit, denspn\n");
00192   fprintf(scriptfp, "free_lun, unit\n");
00193   
00194   fprintf(scriptfp, "\n.run multipost, densityplot\n");
00195   if (portrait)
00196     fprintf(scriptfp, 
00197           "pos = initpost('%s.denspn.eps',%d,%d, gapx=1.5, gapy=-0.01, /color)\n",
00198           slaterdetfile, nplots[1], nplots[0]);
00199   else
00200     fprintf(scriptfp, 
00201           "pos = initpost('%s.denspn.eps',%d,%d, gapx=-0.01, gapy=1.5, /color)\n",
00202           slaterdetfile, nplots[0], nplots[1]);
00203   fprintf(scriptfp, "!x.minor = 4\n!y.minor = 4\n");
00204 
00205   int i = 0;
00206   // proton
00207   for (v=0; v<3; v++) {
00208     if (view[v]) {
00209       fprintf(scriptfp, "!p.position = pos(%d,*)\n", portrait ? 2*i : i);
00210       fprintf(scriptfp, "loadct, 14\n");
00211       fprintf(scriptfp, "densityplot, denspn(*,*,%d), %d, %f, %f, %f, %f, $\n",
00212               2*i, v, -xmax, xmax, -xmax, xmax);
00213       fprintf(scriptfp, "\t/cut, /coordinate, /cont, /dens");
00214       if (portrait) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noxaxes");
00215       if (noxaxis) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noxaxes");
00216       if (!frame) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noframe");
00217       if (plain) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noannot");
00218       else fprintf(scriptfp, ", key = '%s - p'", label);
00219       fprintf(scriptfp, "\n");
00220 
00221       i++;
00222     }
00223   }
00224 
00225   i = 0;
00226   // neutron
00227   for (v=0; v<3; v++) {
00228     if (view[v]) {
00229       fprintf(scriptfp, "!p.position = pos(%d,*)\n", portrait ? 2*i+1 : i+nplots[1] );
00230       fprintf(scriptfp, "loadct, 1\n");
00231       fprintf(scriptfp, "densityplot, denspn(*,*,%d), %d, %f, %f, %f, %f, $\n",
00232               2*i+1, v, -xmax, xmax, -xmax, xmax);
00233       fprintf(scriptfp, "\t/cut, /coordinate, /cont, /dens");
00234       if (!portrait) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noyaxes");
00235       if (noxaxis) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noxaxes");
00236       if (!frame) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noframe");
00237       if (plain) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noannot");
00238       else {
00239         fprintf(scriptfp, ", key = '%s - n'", label);
00240         if (logo) fprintf(scriptfp, ", logo = '%s'", logo);
00241       }
00242       fprintf(scriptfp, "\n");
00243 
00244       i++;
00245     }
00246   }
00247 
00248   fclose(scriptfp);
00249 
00250   // calling IDL
00251 
00252   char call[255];
00253 
00254   snprintf(call, 255, "idl < %s", scriptfile);
00255   system(call);
00256 
00257   char epsfile[255];
00258   snprintf(epsfile, 255, "%s.denspn.eps", slaterdetfile);
00259 
00260   // calling gv
00261 
00262   if (!quiet) {
00263     snprintf(call, 255, "gv %s &", epsfile);
00264     system(call);
00265   }
00266 
00267   // clean up
00268 
00269   if (!debug) {
00270     remove(datafile); 
00271     remove(scriptfile);
00272   }
00273 
00274   return 0;
00275 }
